mapper.select: SELECT * FROM diary WHERE id = #{user_id} AND create_date = #{date}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary (title, content, create_date, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{create_date}, #{user_id});
mapper.update: UPDATE diary SET title = #{title}, content=#{content}, create_date = #{create_date}, user_id=#{user_id} WHERE id= #{id};
